PROJECT.DND_INSTRUCTIONS: Drag and drop users to assign to a task

PROJECT_TAB.INSTRUCTION_DEACTIVATE: Deactivate the project when you need to make changes to the workflow.
PROJECT_TAB.INSTRUCTION_DRAFT_CONSTRAINT: You can switch the survey to draft mode while the project is inactive.
PROJECT_TAB.INSTRUCTION_REACTIVATE: Reactivate the project once workflow chnages have been made and you're ready to notify the user of the change.

ACTIVE.TITLE: Activate the project? Check boxes to confirm.
ACTIVE.CHECKBOX_DRAFT: Survey can be switched to draft mode while project is inactive.
ACTIVE.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: All access to project will be restored.
ACTIVE.CHECKBOX_USERS: All users will be notified of this action.

INACTIVE.TITLE: Deactivate the project? Check boxes to confirm.
INACTIVE.CHECKBOX_DRAFT: Survey can be switched to draft mode while project is inactive.
INACTIVE.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: All access to project will be suspended until activated.
INACTIVE.CHECKBOX_USERS: All users will be notified of this action.

SURVEY_TAB.INSTRUCTION_PUBLISH: Publish the survey when you're ready for assignees to access it.
SURVEY_TAB.INSTRUCTION_DRAFT_CONSTRAINT: Once published, you must deactivate the project to edit the survey.
SURVEY_TAB.INSTRUCTION_PROJECT_STATUS: This action does not change the project status.

DRAFT.TITLE: Unpublish the survey? Check boxes to confirm.
DRAFT.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: All assignee access to survey will be suspended until republished.
DRAFT.CHECKBOX_USERS: All users assigned to survey will be notified of this action.
DRAFT.CHECKBOX_EDIT: Only you and specified users can edit survey in draft mode.

PUBLISHED.TITLE: Publish the survey? Check boxes to confirm.
PUBLISHED.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: All assignee access to survey will be suspended until republished.
PUBLISHED.CHECKBOX_USERS: All users assigned to survey will be notified of this action.
PUBLISHED.CHECKBOX_EDIT: Only you and specified users can edit survey in draft mode.
